Bruce Wayne is the single father to his four, mostly, adopted sons: Dick Grayson, Jason Todd, Tim Drake, and Damian Wayne. entry.title: Batlantern for all seasons
entry.summary:
Author: Thetruthfuljelly (Romav)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,811Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 23

Summary: In order to blow off some steam and release tensions, Batman and Green Lantern decide to hook up, if only for the sake of the team. This one time solution turns into a nasty habit, that neither of them can quit through their years in the JLA. Loosely based on Justice League War (At least at the beginning) we follow the lives of Batman and green lantern through several years as their NSA develops into the most meaningful relationship either of them have ever had. entry.title: Soulmates, secrets, and kisses
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,859Chapters: 10/15Kudos: 1,027

Summary: In this world where almost everyone is born with a soulmark that writes the first sentence your soulmate says to you, many, many have expected Damian's soulmark to be something‚Ä¶ fancy, gaudy, and pretentious, even.But then again, nothing is crueler than fate and love, after all.Damian was born with a soulmark on his left chest, right on his heart, written in the colour of gold (of course, it is gold).The soulmark reads.[Hey, that's my chips!]Yes.What an anti-climax. A disappointment, even.
